channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2/2 contaminated recycling bins, 2nd July
item.description:
2 x contaminated recycling bins are not being collected. They need to be removed completely as this is a problematic area for fly tipping and the contamination + non-collection cycle encourages repetition.

Report on FixMyStreet
